oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Can You Work Under the FEPC?
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Dixiecrats; politics; States' Rights Party; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A brochure put out by the States' Rights Party outlining their take on the Fair Employment Practices Commission and Truman's proposed Civil Rights Bill.
